participant_1.background:

i don t like to eat meat.
i am looking for someone.

I don't feel fulfilled in my life and need to express myself more.

participant_2.background:
I want to learn how to train my dog so that we can go on longer hikes together.
My parents are very supportive of my decision to take a break from work to focus on my family.
My favorite type of food is locally sourced, organic food.
I remember singing along to Queens of the Stone Age with my sisters in the car on long road trips.
i drink coffee every day.

content.text: What do you like to do for fun?
I like to go hiking with my dog.
That sounds fun! I love taking my truck out to the mountains on the weekends.
Oh, that sounds fun too! Have you ever been to any of the national parks?
I have been to a few, but I still have a lot to see. I'd love to go to Yosemite one day.
Yosemite is beautiful! I went there a couple years ago and it was amazing.
I'm glad you enjoyed it. I've heard that it's really crowded, but it's worth it for the scenery.
It was pretty crowded, but it was still really nice. I'm glad I got to see it.
Me too. I'm sure I'll go back there someday.
I would love to go back again too.
Do you have any other hobbies?
I like to cook and bake. I also like to play guitar.
Oh, that's cool. I play guitar too. Do you like any particular genres of music?
I like a lot of different genres, but I mostly listen to rock and roll.
Me too! I love classic rock.
Me too! I also like some newer rock bands, like Queens of the Stone Age.
I love them too! They're one of my favorite bands.
They're so good. I love their music.
Me too. I'm glad we have similar taste in music.
Me too
